snippet.title: Monster Mop-Up Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch new gameplay from this charming clean 'em up from Terahard and Yogscast Games starring adorable, pooping Ragamuffins. Mop stains, burn poop and get rewarded with high-tech gear and upgrades. Save enough, and you can even expand your home, decorate it and live happily ever after with your fluffy little friends!

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2451310

#convergenceshow #indiegame
